text: Baltic and Tyle'r-bont Quarries is a Site of Special Scientific Interest in Brecknock, Powys, Wales. The site has important sections of Carboniferous Limestone.http://www.beacons-npa.gov.uk/wp-content/uploads/oldsite/the- authority/planning/strategy-and-policy/the-adopted-local-development- plan-1999/proposals-for-communities/brecon.pdf ==See also== *List of Sites of Special Scientific Interest in Brecknock ==References== Category:Sites of Special Scientific Interest in Brecknock
title: Baltic and Tyle'r-bont Quarries
